text: wan thi phwk cea ca hen man khux mænm thuk khn ca tktalung lum sing thi nang kalang hı nm kæ luk xxn læa hying tang khrrph thuk khn ca khlxd luk thi xyu nı khrrph khxng nang xxk ma læa cea ca hen mnusʹy xyu nı sphaph munmea thang «thi phwk khea midi mea læa tæwakar lngthosʹ khx ngxallxhˌ nan runræng ying nak
